playlistLength.title: Total length may not be accurate if some videos are hidden or if you haven't loaded enough videos to get the full length.

sameKey.speedControl: The scroll wheel speed control modifier key cannot be the same as the scroll wheel volume control modifier key.
sameKey.volumeControl: The scroll wheel volume control modifier key cannot be the same as the scroll wheel speed control modifier key.

info.reset:
All options have been reset to their default values.
You can now save the changes by clicking the "Confirm" button or discard them by closing this page or ignore this notification.

clearData.confirmAlert: This will delete all extension data related to options. Continue?

enable.label: Automatic quality adjustment
enable.title: Automatically adjusts the video quality to the selected level.

select.label: Quality fallback strategy
select.title: The strategy to use when the selected quality is not available

select.label: Player quality
select.title: The quality to set the video to

clear.title: Clears all data this extension has stored on your machine

openTab.title: Open extension settings in a new tab

reset.title: Resets all settings to their defaults, Click the confirm button to save the changes

buttonNames.copyTimestampUrlButton: Copy video URL with timestamp button

player_controls_left.placement: on the left side of player controls

player_controls_right.placement: on the right side of player controls

enable.label: Enable custom CSS
enable.title: Enables custom CSS to be applied to the page

select.label: Menu Activation Type
select.title: Select the method to activate the feature menu

enable.label: Enable forward/rewind buttons
enable.title: Adds forward and rewind buttons to the video player

time.label: Forward/rewind time
time.title: The amount of time to forward/rewind the video by

exportButton.title: Export settings to a JSON file

error.unknown:
Error importing settings. Please check the file format.
An unknown error occurred.
error.validation:
Error importing settings. Please check the file format.
{{ERROR_MESSAGE}}

importButton.title: Import settings from a JSON file

select.label: Language
select.title: The language to use for the extension

automaticTheaterMode.label: Automatic theater mode
automaticTheaterMode.title: Automatically enables theater mode when you load a video

automaticallyDisableAmbientMode.label: Automatically disable ambient mode
automaticallyDisableAmbientMode.title: Automatically disables ambient mode when you load a video

automaticallyDisableClosedCaptions.label: Automatically disable closed captions
automaticallyDisableClosedCaptions.title: Automatically disables closed captions when you load a video

copyTimestampUrlButton.label: Copy video URL with timestamp button
copyTimestampUrlButton.title: Copies video URL with timestamp (?t=123)

hideEndScreenCards.label: Hide end screen cards
hideEndScreenCards.title: Hides the cards at the end of the video

hideEndScreenCardsButton.label: Hide end screen cards button
hideEndScreenCardsButton.title: Adds a button to show/hide the cards at the end of the video

hideOfficialArtistVideosFromHomePage.label: Hide Official Artist Videos
hideOfficialArtistVideosFromHomePage.title: Hide Official Artist Videos from Home Page

hidePaidPromotionBanner.label: Hide paid promotion banner
hidePaidPromotionBanner.title: Hides the banner that appears when you watch a video that has a paid promotion

hideTranslateComment.label: Hide translate comment button
hideTranslateComment.title: Hides 'Translate to Language' button under comments

loopButton.label: Loop button
loopButton.title: Adds a button to the feature menu to loop the video you're watching

maximizePlayerButton.label: Maximize player button
maximizePlayerButton.title: Adds a button to the feature menu to maximize the player

openTranscriptButton.label: Open transcript button
openTranscriptButton.title: Adds a button to the feature menu to open the transcript of the video you're watching

openYouTubeSettingsOnHover.label: Open YouTube settings on hover
openYouTubeSettingsOnHover.title: Opens the YouTube settings menu when you hover over the settings button

pauseBackgroundPlayers.label: Pause background players
pauseBackgroundPlayers.title: Pauses video players in background tabs when you start a new player in foreground tab

remainingTime.label: Remaining time
remainingTime.title: Shows the remaining time of the video you're watching

rememberLastVolume.label: Remember last volume
rememberLastVolume.title: Remembers the volume of the last video you were watching and sets it when you open a new video

removeRedirect.label: Remove YouTube /redirect URLs
removeRedirect.title: Replaces YouTube redirect by actual URLs, skipping redirect warning dialogue

shareShortener.label: Shorten YouTube video share link
shareShortener.title: Shortens YouTube video share link (youtu.be) by stripping si/feature parameters from it

shortsAutoScroll.label: Shorts auto scroll
shortsAutoScroll.title: Automatically scrolls to the next short

skipContinueWatching.label: Skip "Video is paused. Continue watching?"
skipContinueWatching.title: Skips the idle dialog that pauses video playback

playlistRemover.label: Enable the removal of playlists from homepage
playlistRemover.title: Get rid of playlists

color.label: Color
color.title: Select the color for the On-Screen Display

hide.label: Hide Delay
hide.title: Specify the time, in milliseconds, before automatically hiding the On-Screen Display

opacity.label: Opacity
opacity.title: Adjust the transparency of the On-Screen Display

padding.label: Padding
padding.title: Adjust the spacing around the On-Screen Display in pixels. This applies specifically to corner On-Screen Display.

position.label: Position
position.title: Select the position of the On-Screen Display

type.label: Type
type.title: Select the type of On-Screen Display

enable.label: Forced playback speed
enable.title: Sets the video speed to what you choose below

playbackSpeedButtons.label: Playback speed buttons

select.label: Playback buttons speed
select.title: Amount of speed to be changed per click

playbackSpeedButtons.title: Adds buttons to increase or decrease the playback speed of the video you're watching

select.label: Player speed
select.title: The speed to set the video to

enable.label: Display playlist length information
enable.title: Shows the total length of the playlist, how much has been watched, and how much remains.

select.label: Method to get playlist length
select.title: The way to get playlist length information (API method will fallback to HTML if an error occurs)

select.label: Method to get watched time
select.title: The way to get the amount of time watched (Video Length type only used on watch page)

enable.label: Screenshot button
enable.title: Adds a button to the player to take a screenshot of the video

selectFormat.label: Screenshot format
selectFormat.title: The format to save the screenshot in

adjustmentSteps.label: Speed Change Per Scroll
adjustmentSteps.title: Adjust the speed change per scroll

enable.label: Scroll wheel speed control
enable.title: Press a modifier key to enable speed adjustment with the scroll wheel.

adjustmentSteps.label: Volume Change Per Scroll
adjustmentSteps.title: Adjust the volume change per scroll

enable.label: Scroll wheel volume control
enable.title: Lets you use the scroll wheel to control the volume of the video you're watching

enable.label: Enable when holding modifier key
enable.title: Press a modifier key to enable volume adjustment with the scroll wheel.

enable.label: Enable when holding right click
enable.title: Hold right click to enable scroll wheel volume control

enable.label: Track watched videos
enable.title: Keeps track of where you left off on videos you were watching and enables resuming playback

select.label: Resume type
select.title: Select how you want to resume videos

boostAmount.label: Volume boost amount (dB)
boostAmount.title: The amount to boost the volume by

select.label: Volume boost mode
select.title: Choose how volume boost is applied. 'Per video' allows enabling boost for each video individually in the feature menu. 'Global' applies boost to all videos when volume boost is enabled.

enable.title: Activate the selected theme for the page
